description:
http://anidb.net/ch7321 [Sailor Moon] and the senshi are up against a new set of villains: the http://anidb.net/ch8303 [Death Busters] (http://anidb.net/ch8309 [Professor Tomoe], http://anidb.net/ch8313 [Kaorinite], the http://anidb.net/ch8318 [Witches 5], http://anidb.net/ch8328 [Mistress 9], http://anidb.net/ch8459 [Pharaoh 90]). The Death Busters plan to rule the world by using the energy from the pure heart crystals of innocent victims, but Sailor Moon and the senshi must stop them. The outer senshi (http://anidb.net/ch7502 [Neptune], http://anidb.net/ch7497 [Uranus], http://anidb.net/ch7524 [Pluto], http://anidb.net/ch7522 [Saturn]), also make an appearance, although Pluto appeared briefly in Sailor Moon R.
Source: ANN

REGULAR.description:
A new enemy called the Death Busters appears, an organization whose members aim to get their hands on the talismans that can only be found in pure-hearted humans.
Source: hulu

titles.title: Chikyuu Houkai no Yokan? Nazo no Shin Senshi Shutsugen
El comienzo de la nueva batalla
Premonition of the Apocalypse: The Mysterious New Guardians Appear
地球崩壊の予感? 謎の新戦士出現

REGULAR.description:
The Silver Crystal loses its shine—and that means Usagi cannot transform. Mamoru tries to cheer Usagi up by taking her to an area in town that has become the home of a bunch of stray cats.
Source: hulu

titles.title: Ai no Rod Tanjou! Usagi no Shin Henshin
The Rod of Love Is Born: Usagi`s New Transformation
愛のロッド誕生! うさぎの新変身

REGULAR.description:
Usagi and Minako sneak off to the arcade to take a break from their life of studying. While enjoying the latest racing game, the girls are approached by a handsome student named Haruka Tenoh, who wishes to join them for a friendly match.
Source: hulu

titles.title: A Handsome Boy? Haruka Tenoh`s Secret
Suteki na Bishounen!? Ten`ou Haruka no Himitsu
素敵な美少年? 天王はるかの秘密

REGULAR.description:
Usagi asks her friends to help her become a better person worthy of being Mamoru’s bride.
Source: hulu

titles.title: Usagi no Akogare! Yuubi na Tensai Michiru
Usagi`s Idol: The Graceful Genius Michiru
うさぎの憧れ! 優美な天才みちる

REGULAR.description:
Motoki’s little sister Unazuki is a pure-hearted girl who dreams of sharing her first kiss with the person she truly loves.
Source: hulu

titles.title: Hay que salvar el corazón puro
Protect the Pure Heart: The Three-Way Battle
Pure na Kokoro o Mamore! Teki Mikata Mitsudomoe Ransen
Первый поцелуй бывает в жизни только раз
純な心を守れ! 敵味方三つ巴乱戦

REGULAR.description:
A small misunderstanding causes Umino and Naru to believe that the other is no longer interested in them.
Source: hulu

titles.title: Koi no Otasuke wa Moon ni Omakase
Let Moon Help with Your Love Problems
恋のおたすけはムーンにおまかせ

REGULAR.description:
Kaolinite has a new target: Makoto. When Haruka and Michiru find out, they decide to use Makoto as bait in order to obtain her talisman.
Source: hulu

titles.title: Reikoku na Uranus? Makoto no Pinch
冷酷なウラヌス? まことのピンチ

REGULAR.description:
Kaolinite sets her eyes on Ami, believing that the famous girl genius would possess a pure heart full of confidence.
Source: hulu

titles.title: The Labyrinth of Water: Ami Targeted
水のラビリンス! ねらわれた亜美

REGULAR.description:
Realizing that the two mysterious Sailor Guardians Uranus and Neptune are also after the talismans, Kaolinite sends a Daimon to get rid of them for good.
Source: hulu

titles.title: To Save Our Friends: Moon and Uranus Join Forces
Tomodachi o Sukue! Moon Uranus Rengou
友達を救え! ムーンウラヌス連合

REGULAR.description:
Rei’s been spending the past several nights chanting to learn the meaning behind the strange nightmares she’s been having.
Source: hulu

titles.title: A Man`s Kindness: Yuichiro Heartbroken by Rei
Otoko no Yasashisa! Yuuichirou, Rei ni Shitsuren?
男の優しさ! 雄一郎, レイに失恋?

REGULAR.description:
Seeing the happy couples around her, Minako starts questioning her life as a Sailor Guardian and the sacrifices she has to make.
Source: hulu

titles.title: I Want to Quit Being a Sailor Guardian: Minako`s Dilemma
S[セーラー]戦士をやめたい!? 美奈子の悩み
Sailor Senshi o Yametai!? Minako no Nayami

REGULAR.description:
Kaolinite is confident that she has finally found a person possessing the talisman. Aided by a Daimon, Kaolinate goes after her next target: Usagi.
Source: hulu

titles.title: Usagi Namida! Tanjoubi ni Glass no Kutsu o
Usagi in Tears: A Glass Slipper for My Birthday
うさぎ涙! 誕生日にガラスの靴を

REGULAR.description:
Taking Tuxedo Mask as a hostage, Kaolinite tells Usagi and the Sailor Guardians to come to the top of Tokyo Tower for their final showdown.
Source: hulu

titles.title: The Stolen Pure Heart: Usagi`s Crisis
Ubawareta Pure na Kokoro! Usagi Zettai Zetsumei
奪われた純[ピュア]な心! うさぎ絶体絶命

REGULAR.description:
Following Kaolinite’s death, Eudial takes over and begins searching for the talismans. Her first target is Maya, a gifted and world-renowned Taiko drummer.
Source: hulu

titles.title: Ha llegado la pequeña Chibi Luna
Le retour de la petite guerrière
The Arrival of a Small Pretty Guardian
やって来たちっちゃな少女戦士

REGULAR.description:
Chibi-Usa has returned from the future to complete her training as a Sailor Guardian. She is to learn how to make friends in the twentieth century.
Source: hulu

titles.title: Making New Friends: Chibi Moon`s Adventure
Tomodachi o Motomete! Chibi Moon no Katsuyaku
友達を求めて! ちびムーンの活躍

REGULAR.description:
After experiencing a humiliating defeat by a Daimon, Makoto decides to retrain herself in the mountains.
Source: hulu

titles.title: I Want Power: Mako Lost in Doubt
Power ga Hoshii! Mako-chan no Mayoi Michi
Человек не может жить в одиночку
力[パワー]が欲しい! まこちゃんの迷い道

REGULAR.description:
The girls are taking a tour at one of the high schools they plan to apply to next year.
Source: hulu

titles.title: The Bond of Destiny: Uranus`s Distant Past
Unmei no Kizuna! Uranus no Tooi Hi
運命のきずな! ウラヌスの遠い日

REGULAR.description:
Chibi-Usa is stunned at the sight of Usagi and the others enjoying an apple pie since she actually made the pie especially for Masanori, the boy she has a crush on.
Source: hulu

titles.title: Art Is an Explosion of Love: Chibi-Usa`s First Love
Geijutsu wa Ai no Bakuhatsu! Chibi Usa no Hatsukoi
芸術は愛の爆発! ちびうさの初恋

REGULAR.description:
Mamoru and the girls receive an invitation to a party hosted by Edwards, an Englishman who lives alone on the outskirts of the town.
Source: hulu

titles.title: Usagi no Dance wa Waltz ni Notte
うさぎのダンスはワルツに乗って

REGULAR.description:
Minako realizes that she is the only Sailor Guardian who has not been targeted by a Daimon.
Source: hulu

titles.title: Shougeki no Toki! Akasareta Tagai no Shoutai
The Shocking Moment: Everyone`s Identities Revealed
衝撃の刻[とき]! 明かされた互いの正体

REGULAR.description:
Michiru and Haruka sense that soon they will find the talismans.
Source: hulu

titles.title: The Death of Uranus and Neptune: The Talisman Appears
ウラヌス達の死? タリスマン出現

REGULAR.description:
Uranus and Neptune are revealed to be the ones possessing the talismans. In order to save the two, the Sailor Guardians go after Eudial, who is on the run with their talismans.
Source: hulu

titles.title: Seihai no Shinpi na Chikara! Moon Nidan Henshin
The Holy Grail`s Mystical Power: Moon`s Double Transformation
聖杯の神秘な力! ムーン二段変身

REGULAR.description:
Mimete takes over for the deceased Eudial to gather the pure hearts necessary to awaken the Messiah of Silence. Mimete sets as her first target Yosaku Eda, a popular actor whom she is also a fan of.
Source: hulu

titles.title: Shin no Messiah wa Dare? Hikari to Kage no Chaos
Who Is the True Messiah? Chaos of Light and Darkness
真の救世主[メシア]は誰? 光と影のカオス

REGULAR.description:
Usagi is very intrigued when she hears Chibi-Usa is going to a “friend’s” house to play.
Source: hulu

titles.title: A House Filled with Evil Presence: The Beautiful Hotaru`s Secret
Youki Tadayou Ie! Bishoujo Hotaru no Himitsu
妖気漂う家! 美少女ほたるの秘密

REGULAR.description:
Minako and Mimete enter a movie audition where the winner gets to costar with the idol Jinta Araki. As his longtime fans, both girls are eager to win the role no matter what.
Source: hulu

titles.title: アイドル大好き! 悩めるミメット

REGULAR.description:
The Three Guardians of the Outer Solar System sense something dangerous lurking inside Hotaru Tomoe`s personality.
Source: hulu

titles.title: Chinmoku no Kage!? Awaki Hotaru Hi no Yurameki
Shadow of Silence: The Pale Glimmer of a Firefly
沈黙の影!? あわき蛍火のゆらめき

REGULAR.description:
Hotaru tries to avoid Chibi-Usa out of fear that her other violent personality will someday bring harm to her only friend. Undaunted, Chibi-Usa invites Hotaru to go on a picnic.
Source: hulu

titles.title: Arashi Nochi Hare! Hotaru ni Sasageru Yuujou
Sunny Skies After a Storm: A Friendship Dedicated to Hotaru
嵐のち晴れ! ほたるに捧げる友情

REGULAR.description:
Shun Hayase is a high school athlete who sets a new national record in the men`s high jump after overcoming health issues as a child.
Source: hulu

titles.title: Higher and Stronger: A Cheer from Usagi
Yori Takaku Yori Tsuyoku! Usagi no Ouen
より高くより強く! うさぎの応援

REGULAR.description:
A freak accident caused by Mimete results in Hotaru`s house getting pulled into a dimensional rift, with Hotaru and Chibi-Usa trapped inside.
Source: hulu

titles.title: Battle Inside the Demonic Space: The Sailor Guardians` Gamble
Makuu no Tatakai! Sailor Senshi no Kake
魔空の戦い! セーラー戦士の賭け

REGULAR.description:
Usagi and her friends visit a new planetarium, which has opened in the Juban District. Mimete, who has her eyes on the guest DJ Thomas Harris, attacks with Daimon u Choten.
Source: hulu

titles.title: Chinmoku no Messiah Kakusei? Unmei no Hoshiboshi
The Messiah of Silence Awakens? Stars of Destiny
沈黙のメシア覚せい? 運命の星々

REGULAR.description:
Usagi and her friends sneak into Mugen Academy in search of Hotaru, who has gone missing.
Source: hulu

titles.title: An Invasion from Another Dimension: Mystery of Mugen Academy
Ijigen kara no Shinryaku! Mugen Gakuen no Nazo
異次元からの侵略! 無限学園の謎

REGULAR.description:
A new variety of flower called Tellun is being sold at a flower shop in the Juban District.
Source: hulu

titles.title: A Bewitching Flower That Steals Hearts: Tellu, the Third Witch
Kokoro o Ubau Youka! Daisan no Majou Tellu
心を奪う妖花! 第三の魔女テルル

REGULAR.description:
Usagi and the others sneak into the practice examination site of the suspicious Mugen Academy, where they meet a student named Yui Bido who takes an interest in Ami`s intelligence.
Source: hulu

titles.title: Ai o Shinjite! Ami, Kokoro Yasasiki Senshi
Believe in Love: Ami, the Kindhearted Guardian
愛を信じて! 亜美, 心優しき戦士

REGULAR.description:
The last member of the Witches 5, Cyprine, manages to steal a large number of pure hearts from the students of Mugen Academy. Meanwhile, Kaolinite takes notice of Chibi-Usa`s power and kidnaps her!
Source: hulu

titles.title: Hametsu no Kage! Chinmoku no Messiah no Mezame
Shadow of Destruction: The Messiah of Silence Awakens
破滅の影! 沈黙のメシアの目覚め

REGULAR.description:
The revived Mistress 9 attempts to call Pharaoh 90, an energy life-form from another dimension, to Earth.
Source: hulu

titles.title: Semari Kuru Yami no Kyoufu! Kusen no 8 Senshi
The Coming Terror of Darkness: Struggle of the Eight Guardians
迫り来る闇の恐怖! 苦戦の8戦士

REGULAR.description:
Hotaru’s and Mistress 9’s consciousnesses engage in a fierce battle. Sailor Moon gives up the Holy Grail to Souichi Tomoe in order to save Hotaru’s heart, only for it to fall into the hands of Mistress 9!
Source: hulu

titles.title: The Shining Shooting Star: Saturn and the Messiah
輝く流星! サターンそして救世主

REGULAR.description:
Following the fight with Pharaoh 90, Usagi and her friends search for Hotaru in the ruins of Mugen Academy.
Source: hulu

titles.title: A New Life: Parting of the Stars of Destiny
Atarashiki Inochi! Unmei no Hoshiboshi Wakare no Toki
新しき命! 運命の星々別かれの時

REGULAR.description:
The Door of Space and Time is opened, allowing Chibi-Usa to return to the future.
Source: hulu

titles.title: A Guardian`s Realization: Strength Lies Within a Pure Heart
Senshi no Jikaku! Tsuyosa wa Jun na Kokoro no Naka ni
戦士の自覚! 強さは純な心の中に

Getting to Know the Guardians: Sailor Neptune
Getting to Know the Guardians: Sailor Saturn
